sense.gloss: expansion, spreading out, extending, deployment, building up
development (of a situation, story, etc.), advancement, progression, unfolding
playing around (sexually; esp. of a male homosexual), having an active sex life
exhibition, showing, displaying, putting on display
to spread, to extend, to expand, to enlarge, to widen, to broaden
to unfold, to open, to unroll, to unwrap
to scatter about, to spread around
to make flourish, to cause to prosper
solo exhibition, one-man exhibition, one-woman exhibition

sdata.j: コミュニケーションなしに↑進展↑↓しんてん↓はあり↑得↑↓え↓ない。
sdata.e: There cannot be progress without communication.

sdata.j: ↑君↑↓きみ↓はその↑展覧↑↓てんらん↓↑会↑↓かい↓を↑見↑↓み↓るべきだったのに。
sdata.e: You ought to have seen the exhibition.

sdata.j: ↑近代↑↓きんだい↓↑科学↑↓かがく↓↑技術↑↓ぎじゅつ↓はなぜ↑中国↑↓ちゅうごく↓で↑発展↑↓はってん↓しなかったのだろうか。
sdata.e: Why didn't modern technology develop in China?

sdata.j: ↑議論↑↓ぎろん↓が↑空回↑↓からまわ↓りして↑一向↑↓いっこう↓に↑発展↑↓はってん↓しなかった。
sdata.e: The discussion produced a great deal of noise, but no forward motion.

sdata.j: ↑技術↑↓ぎじゅつ↓↑者↑↓しゃ↓の↑不足↑↓ふそく↓が↑当社↑↓とうしゃ↓の↑発展↑↓はってん↓の↑最大↑↓さいだい↓のネックだ。
sdata.e: The shortage of engineers is the greatest bottleneck to the development of our company.

sdata.j: ↑幹線↑↓かんせん↓↑道路↑↓どうろ↓の↑建設↑↓けんせつ↓は↑郊外↑↓こうがい↓の↑発展↑↓はってん↓に↑寄与↑↓きよ↓するだろう。
sdata.e: The construction of a highway will contribute to the growth of the suburbs.

sdata.j: ↑株主↑↓かぶぬし↓は↑同社↑↓どうしゃ↓の↑急速↑↓きゅうそく↓な↑海外↑↓かいがい↓での↑事業↑↓じぎょう↓↑展開↑↓てんかい↓を↑懸念↑↓けねん↓した。
sdata.e: Shareholders were concerned about the company's swift expansion overseas.

sdata.j: ↑会社↑↓かいしゃ↓での↑彼↑↓かれ↓の↑今後↑↓こんご↓の↑展望↑↓てんぼう↓はあまり↑明↑↓あか↓るくない。
sdata.e: His career prospects at the company are not too promising.

sdata.j: ↑会議↑↓かいぎ↓↑場内↑↓じょうない↓で↑自社↑↓じしゃ↓の↑製品↑↓せいひん↓の↑展示↑↓てんじ↓↑場↑↓じょう↓を↑設↑↓もう↓けたいとお↑考↑↓かんが↓えでしたら、↑早急↑↓そうきゅう↓にご↑連絡↑↓れんらく↓↑下↑↓くだ↓さい。
sdata.e: Please let me know immediately if you would like to set up an area of the conference room for your products.

sdata.j: ↑我々↑↓われわれ↓は↑皆↑↓みな↓↑国↑↓こく↓の↑発展↑↓はってん↓に↑一身↑↓いっしん↓をささげた。
sdata.e: All of us devoted ourselves to the development of our country.
